name: fierceness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being physically violent and frightening: He pulled my face to his with a sudden fierceness. Leaked video clips from soldiers in the field have brought home the fierceness of the fighting.
the quality of being strong and powerful: The fierceness of the storm was unexpected. Firefighters were unable to reach the woman because of the fierceness of the flames.
involving strong feeling or energetic activity: I was impressed by the fierceness of his desire to win. Laurie brings a fierceness to the role that one would have never predicted from his past work.
